data.title: The Last Book in the Universe — Fruitport District Library
data.meta_description: The Last Book in the Universe — Philbrick, W. R. (W. Rodman) — A thousand years in the future, an earthquake destroys much of the planet, and an epileptic teenager nicknamed Spaz begins the heroic fight to bring human intelligence back to Earth.
